name: Plant-It
description: An application where users can plan their garden, obtain information about plants, and interact with fellow plant enthusiasts.

name: Next Step
description: A job posting application for homeless populations; employees can browse jobs and contact managers, while employers can post new jobs.

name: Recipes by Nutrition
description: An application where a user enters a type of meal and is presented with a recipe, as well as the recipe's nutritional information.

name: Employee Directory
description: An application that provides a list of 200 employees, as well as the option to sort them by last name or search by any letter in their name.

name: Google Book Search
description: An application where users can search books using the Google Books API, view additional information for books, and add books to a list of favorites.

name: Eat-Da-Burger
description: A virtual restaurant app where viewers can devour burgers at the click of a button, add new burgers, and delete burgers they've eaten.
